Query SPARQL: SELECT DISTINCT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?class; SEPARATOR=";  ") AS ?classes)  WHERE {<"""+res_uri+"""> a ?class}
Query SPARQL example: SELECT DISTINCT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?class; SEPARATOR=";  ") AS ?classes)  WHERE {<https://w3id.org/dh-atlas/1728943937-3007112> a ?class}

Query SPARQL: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>         SELECT DISTINCT ?label WHERE {                 <"""+uri+"""> (rdfs:label | skos:prefLabel) ?label         }
Query SPARQL example: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>         SELECT DISTINCT ?label WHERE {                 <https://w3id.org/dh-atlas/1728943937-3007112> (rdfs:label | skos:prefLabel) ?label         }

Query SPARQL: PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?entity) as ?count) WHERE { ?entity a ?class . }
PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?project) as ?count) WHERE { ?project a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent>; a <https://schema.org/ResearchProject> . }
PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?product) as ?count) WHERE { ?product a <https://schema.org/Dataset> . }
PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?organization) as ?count) WHERE { ?organization a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent>; a <https://schema.org/Organization> . }
PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?person) as ?count) WHERE { ?person a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent>; a <https://schema.org/Person> . }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count) WHERE { GRAPH ?g { ?item a <https://schema.org/Dataset> . ?item <http://schema.org/additionalType> ?additionalType . ?additionalType rdfs:label ?label .  } } GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY DESC(?count)

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT ?label (COUNT(DISTINCT ?researchProduct) AS ?count) WHERE {  ?researchProduct a <https://schema.org/Dataset> .  ?researchProduct ?contributor ?organization .   GRAPH ?g { ?organization a <https://schema.org/Organization> . ?organization rdfs:label ?organizationLabel . BIND(STR(?organizationLabel) AS ?label) } } GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 6

Query SPARQL: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT ?geonames ?label (COUNT(DISTINCT ?geonames) AS ?count) WHERE { ?organization a <https://schema.org/Organization> . ?organization <http://schema.org/location> ?geonames . ?geonames rdfs:label ?label . } GROUP BY ?geonames ?label ORDER BY ?geonames
